scripts.clean: npm run clean:bundle && npm run clean:node_modules
scripts.build: npm run clean:bundle && npm run build:all
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean:bundle && cross-env __FIREFOX__=true npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/dev-utils && npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/hmr && npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/ui && npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/schema-utils && npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/i18n && npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/shared && npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/storage && npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/tailwind-config && npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/vite-config && npm run build --workspace=@nanobrowser/zipper && npm run build --workspace=chrome-extension && npm run build --workspace=pages/content && npm run build --workspace=pages/options && npm run build --workspace=pages/side-panel
scripts.zip: npm run build:all && npm run zip --workspace=@nanobrowser/zipper
scripts.zip:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cross-env __FIREFOX__=true npm run zip --workspace=@nanobrowser/zipper
scripts.e2e: npm run build:all && npm run zip && npm test
scripts.e2e:firefox: npm run build:firefox && npm run zip:firefox && npm test
